title: [K-12] Professional Development Course for Online Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of foundational theories in secondary science education and experience in lesson design
context.additional_context: Process for science teachers to acquire methods of utilizing asynchronous learning materials and communities of practice for effective online instructional design

learning_goals: Learners can independently develop three or more asynchronous learning objects (ALOs) for online science education design.
Learners can improve instructional design twice or more by incorporating peer feedback through community of practice activities.
Learners can measure the effectiveness of online educational materials using LMS-based assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
